metaTitle: All Near Latest Transactions | Near Blocks
metaDescription: All Near Transactions confirmed on Near Blockchain. The list consists of transactions from sending Near and the transactions details for each transaction.
heading: Transactions

txn.metaDescription: Near Blockchain detailed info for transaction {{txn}}.
txn.heading: Transaction Details

block.tooltip: The number of the block in which the transaction was recorded.

timestamp.tooltip: Timestamp of when this transaction was submitted.

deposit.tooltip: Sum of all NEAR tokens transferred from the Signing account to the Receiver account. This includes tokens sent in a Transfer action(s), and as deposits on Function Call action(s).

fee.tooltip: Total fee paid in NEAR to execute this transaction.

price.tooltip: Closing price of Ⓝ on date of transaction

from.tooltip: Account that signed and sent the transaction

gas.tooltip: Maximum amount of gas allocated for the transaction & the amount eventually used.

testnetNotice: [ This is a Testnet transaction only ]
